Name: Defender Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: One of those drinks where the bitter oils from the orange zest twist are crucial to its fine balance.
History: Adapted from Albert Stevens Crockett's 1931 Old Waldorf Bar Days which explains, " The name of an American yacht which took care of one of Sir Thomas Lipton's early but seemingly endless Shamrocks ". [Shamrock being the name of Sir Thomas Lipton's fleet of America's Cup racing yachts.]
Nutrition: One serving of Defender Cocktail contains 176 calories
